com.dodgydive

Class Shark

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dodgydive.Shark

  • public class Shark
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that draws and updates a shark enemy. This is used in an Array of sharks to spawn several sharks on screen while the game is being played.
    Author:
    Damian Jimenez, jimenez.dmn@gmail.com
    Maurice Harris, maurice.harris@mavs.uta.edu
    Neunzo Vincent, neunzo.thomas@mavs.uta.edu
    Craig Lautenslager, craig.lautenslager@mavs.uta.edu

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shark

        public Shark(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion sharkTexture)
        Constructor method for the class. Set's up the Shark instance and set's the texture that will be used to display the Shark, as well as creating the animation and collision rectangle for the Shark.
        Parameters:
        sharkTexture - Texture for the sharks.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta,
                   float rand,
                   Diver diver)
        Updates the position of the shark.
        Parameters:
        delta - float that will be used to move the shark to the left and update the animation timer.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(float x,
                        float y)
        Sets the position of the shark and its collision rectangle
        Parameters:

        y - the value to be used to set the y-position of the shark

      • hasCollidedWithDiver

        public boolean hasCollidedWithDiver(Diver diver)
        Checks whether the shark's rectangle has collided with the diver's collision rectangle.
        Parameters:
        diver - the object to be checked for a collision.
        Returns:
        boolean representing whether a collision has happened or not

      • diverInRange

        public boolean diverInRange(Diver diver)
        Checks whether the shark is within follow range of the diver
        Parameters:
        diver - the object whose range will be checked for following distance.
        Returns:
        boolean representing whether the shark is in range or not
